Articles.Content:
Ever wanted a small, lightweight, fuel packed Duna Orbit ferry? Are you a newbie, that needs a good made Duna lander with huge margins for error? Well, welcome to heaven. After about ten thinking-filled minutes, I bring you The Duna Micro. It has a docking port, monoprop for docking, An extremely low weight (12 tons full), about 1600 units of electric charge, and a ton of fuel after ascending from orbit (I think you can return to Kerbin), and it features ROUND-8 tanks (what would we do without the lifesavers)!

No Pics, No Clicks

Here you go: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=438403793 (I used Engineer for Delta-v

Does it really work?!

Of course it does! Use Engineer or Mechjeb to make sure it really does if you don't believe me.

Download Link

https://www.dropbox.com/s/srlao1btus5q9vw/The%20Duna%20Micro.craft?dl=0

Happy flying! Enjoy and have fun as always.
I do love the way lifesavers stack.

I do love the way lifesavers stack.
That's why I used them, tons of fuel in a lifesaver like 1 millimeter long.
